ws
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ws.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Constants, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Explorer, Wumpus
public abstract class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Constants, java.io.Serializable

The wumpus server's model of an agent - an explorer of a wumpus - in the wumpus' world.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

alive

private boolean alive
Flag indicating whether this agent is alive. It's initially true, and can be set to false once (by the method kill()).

column

private int column
The column of the cave in which this agent is in. The left-lower room is considered to be numbered (0,0).

direction

private int direction
The direction of the agent.
See Also:
Constants.UP, Constants.LEFT, Constants.DOWN, Constants.RIGHT

name

private java.lang.String name
The name of this agent.

row

private int row
The row of the cave in which this agent is in. The left-lower room is considered to be numbered (0,0).
Constructor Detail

Agent

public Agent(java.lang.String name,
             int row,
             int column,
             int direction)
Creates a new agent, given its name, original position and direction.
Parameters:
name - the name of this agent.
row - the row of the cave this agent will start.
column - the column of the cave this agent will start.
direction - the initial direction of this agent.
See Also:
Constants.UP, Constants.LEFT, Constants.DOWN, Constants.RIGHT
